name: SCP-001
desc:
SCP-001 is a set of two (2) objects and thirty-three (33) documents belonging to [DATA EXPUNGED], alias 'The Administrator'.

SCP-001-01 and SCP-001-02 are, respectively, [DATA EXPUNGED]

SCP-001-03 through SCP-001-35 are a mixed set of handwritten and printed documents. They are normal in all respects except that they do not show signs of aging or fading in any way, and dating of the paper on which they are comprised of has shown inconsistent results. The contents of these documents, as detailed below, consist of

[DATA EXPUNGED]
[DATA EXPUNGED]

[DATA EXPUNGED] as **these objects formed the impetus for the creation of the SCP Foundation, and all of its constituent activities and processes.** As such, this information is only to be disseminated by direct order of O5 Command as per Protocol Zero.
